intro: EventyFast places great importance on protecting the personal data of its users. This privacy policy explains how we collect, use, and protect your data in accordance with the General Data Protection Regulation (GDPR).
Nous collectons ces données afin de: We collect this data in order to
communication utilisateurs: Communicate with users for notifications or important updates
sécurité des comptes: Ensure account security (authentication and fraud prevention)
conservation des données: Data is retained as long as the user account is active. It is deleted within 12 months after account deletion, unless otherwise required by law.
pas de partage: We do not share user data with third parties.
Conformément au RGPD: In accordance with GDPR, you have the following rights
exercer ces droits: You can exercise these rights via
formulaire de contact: The contact form available on our website
modification profil: Modifying your information directly in your profile
Nous mettons en place des mesures: We implement measures to protect your data
Hashage des mots de passe: Password hashing to prevent plaintext recovery
Authentification 2FA: Two-factor authentication (2FA) to enhance account security
Envoi d'emails de confirmation: Sending confirmation emails in case of account information changes
Les données sont stockées: Data is stored on secure servers located in [specify server location].
Pour toute question: For any questions regarding this privacy policy or to exercise your rights, you can contact us through our
modification politique: We reserve the right to modify this policy in case of legal or technical changes. Users will be informed in case of significant updates.
Ravi de vous revoir ! Continuez à explor: Glad to see you again! Keep exploring events and discovering new opportunities.
Que vous souhaitiez organiser un événeme: Whether you want to organize an unforgettable event or find an outing that suits you, you're in the right place.
Ne manquez rien des dernières annonces e: Don't miss the latest announcements and join the events that interest you now!
EventyFast est une plateforme innovante: EventyFast is an innovative platform that allows you to create, manage, and participate in events with ease.
Notre mission est de connecter les passi: Our mission is to connect event enthusiasts and make organizing memorable gatherings easier.
Créez facilement vos propres événements: Easily create your own events and share them with the community.
Rejoignez des événements en un clic et c: Join events with one click and connect with other participants.
Discutez et échangez avec les autres mem: Chat and interact with other members in our discussion space.
footerText: © 2025 EventyFast - Organize and join the best events created by our users!
Merci, votre message a bien été envoyé !: Thank you, your message has been sent! We will get back to you shortly.
Une erreur est survenue. Veuillez réessa: An error occurred. Please try again.
Merci, {{username}}. Votre message a bie: Thank you, {{username}}. Your message has been sent! We will get back to you shortly.
Êtes-vous sûr de vouloir supprimer cet u: Are you sure you want to delete this user?
Ne manquez aucune occasion de vivre des: Don't miss any opportunity to experience unforgettable moments
Trouvez l'événement qui vous convient en: Find the event that suits you in one click
Le mot de passe doit contenir au moins 6: The password must be at least 6 characters long.
Le mot de passe doit contenir au moins u: The password must contain at least one letter.
The password must contain at least one number.
